content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (52.5, -84.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) containing coal.
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal and depositing into the wooden chest.

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-25.0, -64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-25.0, -64.0) extracting copper ore and iron ore.
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to other entities.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore.

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (-19.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring items to and from the furnace.

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items to and from a wooden chest at position (1.5, 0.5).

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of the following belt groups:
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-26.5, -65.5) to (-22.5, -65.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-23.5, -64.5) to (-21.5, -64.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-20.5, -64.5) to (-20.5, -66.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-15.5, -63.5) to (-15.5, -65.5).
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-14.5, -54.5) to (-17.5, -59.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when placing entities too far from the player
- Ensure you are within the maximum allowable distance when placing entities. Move closer to the target position before placing the entity.
